'''Omurice Waltz''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Omelette Rice]] with [[Kuki Shinobu]]. The recipe for Omelette Rice is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] in [[Shimura's]] (located in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]]).

Omurice Waltz decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by climbing and sprinting for all party members by '''25'''% for 900 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
